title: Constantly disconnecting from PVP.net
body:
I've tried all the "fixes".  

Changed to google's public DNS, shut down "IP Helper", flushed my DNS, everything.  Nothing helps.  

I constantly get the "Connection Timeout: The request to the PVP.net server timed out." message.

If it happens while waiting for a game I'm unable to click "Accept" therefore I can't play because the queues take too long.  

If I finally get into a game, there is no problem whatsoever.  

PLEASE.  Help me out.

replies.body:
It sounds like your connection specifically to the PvP.net platform service is problematic. This could be caused by your network routing to that specific set of servers, but I'd like you to first ensure your local settings on your network are compatible with those inside our [network guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if you still have issues connecting to PvP.net after taking those steps.
